results.title: Flame within
results.brief_description: A silent film consisting of a montage of images of family, friends, childhood and home juxtaposed to the words passion, freedom and home - each word with its meaning defined in text.

results.title: TV subtitles
results.brief_description: Angry and frustrated when a hotel did not provide tv’s with tv suibtitles, Robert took matters into his own hands to fight for the rights of people with special needs. With Auslan signing and subtitles.

results.title: I live again

results.title: My journey to strength
results.brief_description: Hilda suffers from deafness and here she gives a frank account of the ups and downs in her life and the traumatic effect of losing her mum just before she turned 18. Through support and determination she has survived years of depression and finally found happiness and acceptance. With subtitles.
results.description: Hilda suffers from deafness and here she gives a frank account of the ups and downs in her life and the traumatic effect of losing her mum just before she turned 18. Through support and determination she has survived years of depression and finally found happiness and acceptance. With subtitles.
description_for_label: Hilda suffers from deafness and here she gives a frank account of the ups and downs in her life and the traumatic effect of losing her mum just before she turned 18. Through support and determination she has survived years of depression and finally found happiness and acceptance. With subtitles.

results.title: Vicki's story
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Vicki Atkinson
results.brief_description: Vicki reminisces about her family and childhood and how she looked up to her parents as role models hoping that what she has learned from them can be passed on to her own two daughters. This is her message.
results.description: Vicki reminisces about her family and childhood and how she looked up to her parents as role models hoping that what she has learned from them can be passed on to her own two daughters. This is her message.

results.title: A Place called Gapuwiyak
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Nicole La Gerche
results.brief_description: This is Nicole’s story of her experiences living in East Arnhem, of being adopted into and accepted by the Wunungmurra family and the Yolngu community.

results.title: Where is my story?
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Julian Silverman
results.brief_description: Julian reflects on the past and the untold stories of the Holocaust’s devastating impact on his family. Uses b&w archival footage of WWII and post WWII.
